verses.verse: Therefore <WG5105> Also <WG2532> We <WG2249> So Great <WG5118> Having <WG2192> Encompassing <WG4029> Us <WG2254> A Cloud <WG3509> Of Witnesses, <WG3144> Weight <WG3591> Having Laid Aside <WG659> Every <WG3956> And <WG2532> The <WG3588> Easily Surrounding <WG2139> Sin, <WG266> ' With <WG1223> Endurance <WG5281> We Should Run <WG5143> The <WG3588> Lying Before <WG4295> Us <WG2254> Race <WG73>

And, <WG2532> So <WG3779> Fearful <WG5398> Was <WG2258> The <WG3588> Spectacle That <WG5324> Moses <WG3475> Said, <WG2036> Greatly Afraid <WG1630> I Am <WG1510> And <WG2532> Trembling : <WG1790>
